text: kya tumane un logon ko nahin dekha jinako saragoshiyaan karane se mana kiya gaya garaz jis kaam kee unako mumaaniat kee gayee thee usee ko phir karate hain aur (lutf to ye hai ki) gunaah aur (beja) jyaadatee aur rasool kee naapharamaanee kee saragoshiyaan karate hain aur jab tumhaare paas aate hain to jin laphzon se khuda ne bhee tum ko salaam nahin kiya un laphzon se salaam karate hain aur apane jee mein kahate hain ki (agar ye vaaqee paigambar hain to) jo kuchh ham kahate hain khuda hamen usakee saza kyon nahin deta (ai rasool) unako dozakh hee (kee saza) kaaphee hai jisamen ye daakhil honge to vah (kya) buree jagah hai
